author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Nintendo has raised its hardware forecast as the Switch 2 crosses the 10 million units sold mark. The Switch 2 continues its run as the biggest console launch ever, surpassing the Switch 1 (4.7 million units) and PlayStation 5 (7.8 million units) in their respective first six month milestones. Nintendo now expects to move 19 million units by the end of March 2026. In other Nintendo news, the U.S. Patent Office is going to reexamine a patent awarded to Nintendo regarding the 'summon character and let it fight' Pokémon patent. This could potentially undermine Nintendo's argument in its lawsuit against Palworld developer Pocketpair. And finally, Microsoft's Game Pass Wave 1 offerings for November have been revealed, and as expected Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 leads the charge.

#NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Switch 2 Continues to Be Biggest Console Launch Ever with 10 Million Units Sold - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Director Dan Trachtenberg takes his third crack at Yautja lore with Predator: Badlands, and this time the protagonist is the galaxy’s most notorious trophy hunter himself. With Prey and Predator: Killer of Killers getting released on Hulu only, it's great having the Predators back on the big screen. It’s a pretty wild shift in perspective for the franchise, as well but one that our reviewer thinks Trachtenberg, Elle Fanning and company can pull off.
title: Predator: Badlands Review

author: IGN
description: Based on a true story, two down-on-their-luck musicians (Hugh Jackman and Kate Hudson) form a joyous Neil Diamond tribute band, proving it's never too late to find love and follow your dreams.
title: Song Sung Blue - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Hugh Jackman, Kate Hudson

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Dragon Ball Z DLC Launch Trailer for Minecraft, the hit creation adventure game developed by Mojang. Players can now access a suite of different content from the hit Dragon Ball Z anime, with fighters like Goku, Vegeta, and Trunks. Fight across legendary arenas in co-op tournaments and go Super Saiyan with the Dragon Ball Z DLC for Minecraft, available now.
title: Minecraft x Dragon Ball Z - Official DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Monster Girl Developer Fighter Deep Dive Trailer for Invincible VS, an upcoming fighting game based on the hit Invincible universe developed by Quarter Up. Players can get the rundown on Monster Girl, a 24-year-old woman trapped in a body that decreases in age every time she turns into her Monster-form. Get a look at her moveset, filled with slow yet powerful attacks, being the biggest fighter in the game. Fight as Monster Girl in Invincible VS, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Invincible VS - Official Monster Girl Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Oga’s Cantina at Star Wars: Galaxy Edge is home to out of this world drinks and snacks. We visited Hollywood Studios in Walt Disney World to try out some fan favorites and some new additions. 

Carbon Freeze
Hyperspace (Punch It!)
Fuzzy Tauntaun
Bespin Fizz
NYSILLIN AND BUBBLES WITH BRUB BERRY ESSENCE
Blue Bantha 
Batuu Bits
THRUSTER ROASTED BANTHA FLATBREAD
title: New Items and Old Favorites at Oga’s Cantina: Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PC Features Launch Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players can soon experience the biggest Black Ops to date with a full suite of modes, including Campaign, Zombies, and Multiplayer. The PC version is also fitted with ultra-wide monitor support, AMD FSR 4, and more. 

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #CallOfDuty #BlackOps7
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official PC Features Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
What if the 1980's became the jumping off point for the future? Like how this year's Fantastic Four movie was a '50's version of the future? Enter ROUTINE, an upcoming first-person sci-fi horror game set on a lunar base. Like all good horror games, silence and loneliness are your worst enemies, and that's true in ROUTINE – except for the part where you discover a foe who thinks the primary threat is, in fact, you. Piece together the events that took place prior to your arrival, and try to survive.

ROUTINE is our IGN First "cover story" game for November, ahead of its December 4 release for PC (Steam and Xbox on PC) and Xbox (Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Xbox Cloud) – including Xbox Game Pass on day one. This first exclusive video (watch it above) introduces you to the C.A.T. Ultraview Module, a tool you'll need to make frequent use of as you explore the lunar base. It looks like a camcorder and a radar gun had a baby, and...you'll have to check out the video to see what it does. Wi
title: ROUTINE: Introducing the C.A.T. Ultraview Module – IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to the Frontier, Renegade. 

Watch the latest Destiny 2: Renegades trailer for this upcoming DLC expansion for the FPS game. Iconic new weapons and armor inspired by myth and rebellion are coming to Destiny 2: Renegade. Check out weapons like Uncivil Discourse hand cannon, modified B-7 pistol hand cannon, All or Nothing pulse rifle, M-17 Fast Talker submachine gun, and much more in this new Destiny 2: Renegades trailer. Destiny 2: Renegades will be available on December 2, 2025.

#IGN #Destiny2 #Destiny2Renegades
title: Destiny 2: Renegades - Official New Weapons and Gear Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at a brand new outing for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, the latest installment in the first-person action-adventure shooter series developed by Retro Studios. Players will explore the remnants of an ancient planet called Viewros as Samus Aran. Make use of a wide arsenal to take out enemies, solve environmental puzzles, and make it home in one piece. Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is launching on December 4 for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#MetroidPrime4Beyond #Gaming #IGN
title: Nintendo Delivers a New Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Trailer - What Do You Think?

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at the Drownlight announcement trailer for the upcoming city-building survival simulator game set in a post-apocalyptic oceanic world. Build and expand your floating city in a world drowned beneath the waves. Center your survival around a mysterious lighthouse that draws in the lost, manage scarce resources, make moral decisions, and face the horrors that lurk beyond the light. The Drownlight announcement trailer showcases gameplay and what you can expect. Drownlight will be available on PC via Steam.
title: Drownlight - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
IGN join Outside Xbox in Battlefield 6 with a new NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 GPU #sponsored

SCAN provided us with a NVIDIA 5070 GPU to play Battlefield 6 with Outside Xbox #sponsored

Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1
title: Challenge Chaos in Battlefield 6 with IGN and Outside Xbox

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Pigeon Simulator trailer for this SCP-inspired co-op adventure game. Pigeon Simulator will be available on Xbox Series X|S and Game Pass on November 11, 2025.

Being a pigeon is more than just roaming the cities, eating trash and annoying people sitting in restaurants. It’s a responsibility to maintain order, keep the streets clean (poop notwithstanding) and contain any anomalous entities that might be terrorising the city.

In Pigeon Simulator, you and up to 3 other feathered agents are tasked with shouldering this responsibility as members of the elite Paranormal Examination & Kontainment (P.E.K.) Unit.

#IGN #PigeonSimulator #CoOp
title: Pigeon Simulator - Official Xbox Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Battlefield 6 is out now and we want to experience it in as many frames as possible, so PC hardware supplier SCAN provided us with a NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 GPU to upgrade our gaming PC, plus some rigs for the rest of the squad. Our friends at Outside Xbox joined us to complete some chaotic challenges, all while using the latest NVIDIA tech including DLSS 4 and NVIDIA Reflex. Sponsored by SCAN.

Upgrade your gaming PC with a new GPU, or purchase the rigs used in this video at scan.co.uk. 

Subscribe to IGN for more!
http://www.youtube.com/user/IGNentertainment?sub_confirmation=1

#IGN #Battlefield6 #OutsideXbox
title: Challenge Chaos in Battlefield 6 with IGN and Outside Xbox

author: IGN
description:
Set in the wake of the iconic cliffhanger that ended Baahubali: The Beginning, The Eternal War will follow the betrayed and murdered prince Amarendra Baahubali (voiced by Telugu cinema superstar Prabhas in a reprisal of his film role) into the afterlife. His heart aching for those he left behind, Amarendra Baahubali finds himself at the center of an ancient cosmic war between devas and asuras. 

As he navigates through the 14 realms of existence, he forges an unlikely alliance, confronts divine forces beyond mortal comprehension, and fights to restore balance to the cosmos. Ramya Krishna reprises her role from the live-action films as well, voicing Sivagami once again.

This two-part animated epic is directed by award-winning filmmaker Ishan Shukla, produced by S.S. Rajamouli, Shobu Yarlagadda, and Prasad Devineni, and with music by Oscar-winner MM Keeravaani.

#IGN #Movies
title: Baahubali: The Eternal War - Official Trailer (2027)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Made in USA DLC Launch Trailer for JDM: Japanese Drift Master, an arcade open world racing game developed by Gaming Factory. 

Players will soon be able to access classic cars from the United States, bringing six cars and a suite of tuning parts to the game. Take to the streets of Japan in the Ironvale Thunderbolt T40, Ironvale Stallion ‘69, Taipan, Delray Vanquisher TR, Delray Venom, and the Falcon HellFeather. The Made in USA DLC is launching on November 6 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #JDM #ArcadeRacer
title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master - Official Made in USA DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Football Manager 26, a football (soccer) management simulation game developed by Sports Interactive. 

Players will control the parameters of the biggest sport in the world, from the team name, roster, plays in the game, and more. Football Manager 26 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, Apple Arcade, Netflix Games, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #FootballManager26 #ManagementSim
title: Football Manager 26 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Warhammer Survivors announcement trailer for the upcoming fast-paced rogue-like survivors game from developer and publisher Auroch Digital (Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun) in partnership with poncle (Vampire Survivors) and Warhammer. Warhammer Survivors will be available on PC (Steam) in 2026.

Endorsed as part of the official Survivors lineage, this standalone game brings familiar tides of endless enemies with fresh twists, iconic characters, and powerful weapons, packaged up in entirely new settings. 

Choosing from the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar universes, players will lead a roster of iconic characters and endure against the swarms of relentless enemies. Weapons and power-ups can be combined into devastating new forms to create screen-clearing storms of bullets, blades and magic.

The Warhammer Survivors reveal trailer showcases some of the playable characters and enemy factions from the respective Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer Age of Sigmar u
title: Warhammer Survivors - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Blow your leaves and your cares away. Get another look at Leaf Blower Co. in this latest trailer for the upcoming chilled-out work sim game. Build up your business, buy new tools, and unlock upgrades - all while watching the leaves fly. After all, one man’s trash is another man’s cash. Leaf Blower Co. will be available on PC via Steam on November 17, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Leaf Blower Co - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Satisfactory is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S. It is also available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store). Watch the Satisfactory launch trailer for this first-person open-world factory building game set on an exotic alien planet. Playable for 1-4 players, Satisfactory focuses on space exploration and the freedom to build complex, unlimited structures. The new trailer showcases what you can expect and its conveyor-crazy world.

#IGN #gaming
title: Satisfactory - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Street Fighter 6 crosses over with classic Capcom arcade platformer: Ghosts 'n Goblins! 

Challenge opponents to earn Premium Rewards like EX colors for A.K.I. and Blanka, unlock new Challenger Screen illustrations, Arthur's armor for your avatar, and more!

Street Fighter 6 is out now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, PC (Steam) and Nintendo Switch 2!

#IGN #StreetFighter6 #FightingGames
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official "Ghost 'n Goblins Gala Fighting Pass" Trailer

author: IGN
description: The world is a perplexing, peaceful mystery to Amélie until a miraculous encounter with chocolate ignites her wild sense of curiosity. As she develops a deep attachment to her family’s housekeeper, Nishio-san, Amélie discovers the wonders of nature as well as the emotional truths hidden beneath the surface of her family’s idyllic life as foreigners in post-war Japan.
title: Little Amelie or the Character of Rain - Official Trailer #2 (English Subtitles)
